author: HuguesBrun
body:
- cleaning of the list of paths monitored in `HLTMuonOfflineAnalyzer` and addition of new paths
- in `hltMuonValidator_cfi.py`: reorder the regular expression according to the actual name of muon paths in the HLT menu
- fix a bug in `HLTMuonValidator.cc` to monitor tracker muon paths with no isolation
title: update of muon HLT validation DQM code
